ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I CALL THIS earth to witness --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay! I swear by this city
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I do not (need to) swear by this town (Mecca)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! I swear by this city;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! I swear by this city.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No! I swear by this land,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, I swear by this city -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I do call to witness this City;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, I swear by this country (Mecca),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I swear by this city, Makkah -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:1] I swear (lā is extra) by this land, of Mecca,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (Nay, I swear by this city): '(Nay, I swear by this city) He says: I swear by the city of Mecca
